document_data.name: Street of the Blithe Genie
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of the Blithe Genie''' was located in the [[Court District]] of [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Notable Locations: The [[White Agate's Tower|mansion and tower]] of the famous [[White Agate]] was located on this street.
